title: ASMR AND QUANTUM HYPNOSIS 1 / DEEP NON-VERBAL HYPNOTIC TRANCES
description:
Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Mesmerism and Fascination. His masterclasses teach the most unique non-verbal hypnosis techniques. His student become professional hypnotherapists. They experience strong hypnotic states of hypnotic induction, catalepsy, crisis, mesmerism and more. Waking up, they feel deeply liberated. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info
